sentences.english: And Hainan's mangrove, rich coral reef are also well-known attractions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，海南的紅樹林，豐富的珊瑚礁也是著名的景色。

sentences.english: There are 193 mangroves bird species, among them 89 species are waterbirds.
sentences.chinese: 記錄到193種紅樹林鳥類，其中89種是水鳥。

sentences.english: We'reWe'll also have to think about restoring some of our habitats like mangroves and coral reefs.
sentences.chinese: 我們還需要考慮恢復一些居住地，像紅樹林和珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: The current extent of mangroves is probably half of what once existed.
sentences.chinese: 目前紅樹林覆蓋的範圍也許是昔日存在的一半。

sentences.english: There are 111 species of benthic macrofauna in Shankou mangrove reserve area, Guangxi, China.
sentences.chinese: 山口紅樹林區有111種大型底棲動物。

sentences.english: "Carbon in mangroves is really about the below-ground story, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “碳在紅樹林是真正關心地下的故事，”他說。

sentences.english: Fish swim around the mangrove roots.
sentences.chinese: 魚兒們在紅樹根周圍游來游去。

sentences.english: To study the geographical features of the mangrove stand.
sentences.chinese: 考察該紅樹林生長的地理特徵。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the organic acids in the leaf of Cerbera manghas L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究半紅樹植物海芒果葉中的有機酸類成分。

sentences.english: Order under the moss and mangrove, Sparse rain in mid-depression.
sentences.chinese: 階下青苔與紅樹，雨中寥落月中愁。

sentences.english: The seed of the mangrove flows with the sea water and grows when it comes to the land.
sentences.chinese: 紅樹林的種子隨海水流動，而當到達陸地時成長。

sentences.english: Microbial Study of Mangrove Soil at Dongzhai Harbor in Hainan.
sentences.chinese: 海南東寨港紅樹林土壤微生物初探。

sentences.english: Mangrove forests grow along the shorelines of 118 countries and territories.
sentences.chinese: 紅樹林分佈於118個國家領土的海岸線周邊。

sentences.english: Cyclosa mulmeinensis was dominant species in mangrove area.
sentences.chinese: 角腹艾蛛是紅樹林區的優勢種。

definition: Yantian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong

Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
